name: Scopophobia Release
description:
Scopophobia is a horror happening in a hotel, your fear is the fear of the main character. Whether you can solve all the secrets of this hotel, or maybe not, depends only on you...

  • You can follow the hotel by cameras, walk along the corridors, or explore the rooms, and the wonderful atmosphere will bring you to a complete immersion in this hotel.
  • Immersive experience: Realistic graphics and sounds, as well as minimal user interfaces will provide you with a complete immersion that will keep you on your toes.
  • Explore: Use a flashlight, a neon wand, a camera, even a gun! Everything that can help you in salvation. It all depends on you!
  • Mental state: It all depends on you, the more you see paranormal phenomena, the worse you feel, mental health is directly proportional to mental activity, do not forget to take pills!

System Requirements

Minimum Recommended ОС: Windows 7 64-BIt Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 RAM: 8 GB RAM Graphics card: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390 Disk space: 8 GB Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 Bit  Processor: Intel Core i5-7400  RAM: 8 GB RAM  Video card: NVIDIA 1050 TI  Disk space: 8 GB

Control buttons:

Tab - open inventory

Left mouse button - Open the door / Use

Right mouse button - Use the key

Game doors differ in color

Hint: The first door under the number 13
